t: Warsaw Chemical Announces the Acquisition of Magic Finish Premium Car Care from Cul-Mac Industries — Warsaw Chemical
s: October 29, 2024 - WARSAW, Ind., October 28, 2024 – Warsaw Chemical (Warsaw), a leader in the formulation and manufacturing of car wash chemistries, announced today that it has acquired the Magic Finish® Premium Car Care brand of car wash chemicals and auto detail products from Cul-Mac Industries (Cul-Mac).
